productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.5 3.5 out of 5 stars 983 ratings 3.5 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Design Inspired The JOY is an easy to use phone that utilize attractive elements with streamline form. The leather pattern on battery cover offer an perfect hand feel experience and impressive look. Available in Black and Red. Life Matters The JOY is more then a phone, it is a life giver when an emergency arises. With a built in SOS button user can easily gain access to the police, medical , or fire fighter at the press of a button. Nothing is more important than peace of mind. Flash Light Built in flash light allow for quick light up in the dark environments. Quick access with slider switch on the side.

Clear Display A generous 2.4" display for a clear view. From videos to picture, there is nothing that the JOY is not capable of. Hours Of Entertainment Capture great pictures and video with its VGA Camera. Tune in your favorite music stations on its FM Radio. Listen to all your favorite music on it’s MP3 Player. Watch your video on its MP4 Player. Share all your media via Bluetooth. Save your moments on External Memory (not included). Dual SIM Inside With Dual SIM you could take advantage of different voice/data plans for better rates, better coverage, and separate bills. You can also separate personal from business phone calls. For the international traveler, a Dual SIM phone could avoid roaming charges by having a domestic carrier SIM and a international carrier SIM.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lol, great if you're actually interested.
reviews.reviewText: This must be the second most hilarious phone I've ever bought. But seriously for a moment it's not bad at all for the price. Know this is a under average phone, and is by no means advanced. Camera quality is old, but functional and usable. Flashlight is bright. One thing that's funny is that the battery is literally heavier than the phone. Battery life is great. I bought this for my dad because he's unable to learn how to use a smartphone. I'll try to make a clip of it if I get around to it maybe during my Christmas vacation (2023). It's mostly a cheap plastic, but durable enough to bend and withstand a little careless use which is why i bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars BE AWARE if you are considering the BLU JOY - 2.4", Factory Unlocked Phone.
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautiful cell phone ideally designed for seniors, and those whose hands are physically deformed or who are visually impaired.I purchased this phone, and after several weeks working with BLU Products technical support and my cell carrier support, this phone could not be made to work with my cell phone carrier.My cell phone’s carrier requested the IMEI number found inside this cell phone. They were determined that this phone is a 2G phone, and cannot connect to any cellular network in the United States because the 2G network has been shut down. This obviously makes this device usless as a functioning cell phone.I relayed this information to BLU Products support, but I did not receive a reply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Me encanta portes sencillo y fácil para mi padre y elPrecio muy bueno

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for my grandmother in MEXICO. Her old phone had been nonworking for months, this brings some peace of mind. Be aware that this will most likely not work for you here. 2G is still widely used in MX and Southern America so perfect for what I wanted. *not the best resolution but can't complain for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Phone for Older Adults, Low Vision,
reviews.reviewText: Finally! A phone for my 88 year old father! I chose this model for several reasons including the large numbers and because my elderly father has a tendency to touch the screen on smart phones (which disrupts everything!) This model is the perfect size to place in the car or in a pocket. The brightness is perfect and sound quality is excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Práctico, útil para una persona de la tercera edad
reviews.reviewText: Es un teléfono simple pero que cumple su cometido para personas de la tercera edad o personas que no estén familiarizadas con dispositivos móviles, si algo se puede mejorar es ampliar la cantidad de tonos para llamada, el tono principal resulta un tanto fastidioso, podrían incluir mas tonos al teléfono puesto que al no disponer de aplicaciones descargables ni acceso a la red no es muy personalizable, además sería de gran utilidad que contara con la posibilidad de agregar números o contactos a marcada rápido con el teclado, ya que en ocasiones las personas que no están familiarizadas en la navegación por la agenda de contactos se les dificulta realizar llamadas y sería mejor que pudiera tener los contactos en marcado rápido con solo presionar una tecla.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No instruction manual sent, Very bad.
reviews.reviewText: I was advised to purchase this specific phone by a T Mobile supervisor in Washington who was trying to get me NOT to leave T MObile. I had been searching for a very simple flip or brick style phone for my 85 year old parents. This BLU phone arrived with a lot of good press but NO INTRUCTION MANUAL. There was NOTHING online and I searched extensively, even going to the company website. No user manual existed anywhere for this phone. My poor elderly parents got so frustrated with the phone and the speaker, which was advertised as "hearing aid compatible" and oversized for seniors did not perform as promised. They could not hear well on it and between the 3 of us, we never located the speaker function, which would have at least allowed them to hear better. The phone indeed linked perfectly to T Mobile and it LOOKED good. However, it's ridiculous to sell any kind of electronic device without a user's manual. Even though the customer service folks at T MObile almost laugh at you if you ask about a flip phone, I'd like to say, for the record, that the elderly population in this country is huge and my parents are not unique. A smart phone is not what many folks want. And for manufacturers, as well as cell phone companies, to offer little or no decent products for these folks is simply bad business.
Te las perfectas para personas de la tercera edad
very Cute phone, nice for anyone that only uses it for calling. Not good for texting.It’s the first time I’ve bought anything from this company and there service was awesome.
It worked :) Not very intuitive, but we just needed it to keep our SIM cards active during holidays in another country.
muy practico para personas adultas. los numeros y las teclas son muy grandes. perfectas

Es un teléfono sencillo pero muy práctico para personas mayores o quieren prescindir de teléfonos con Internet como tel. Personal muy bien. Hay que poner tarjeta para aumentar memoria. No viene con el pak
